description: A list of contracts for services to TfL ranging from data storage to specialist cleaning of escalators

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["In line with the February 2015 Local Government Transparency Code we publish details of tenders and contracts with a value over £5,000."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Copies of contracts are published on the Contracts finder website or on our Contracts page .

You can also view contracts released in response to Freedom of Information requests . Contracts provided in response to FOI requests made since 1 January 2017 are published in our Freedom of Information pages .
Older contracts will be published on request and any contract announced in a press release will also be published.
